doc.title: Stag: Our Favorite Fantasies
doc.plot: You're not going to believe this collection of outrageous bachelor party moments from the craziest shows ever! All of your favorite scenes from STAG Season 2 are right here in the hottest, wildest STAG compilation yet! No one said getting married is easy. Find out what happens when these relationships are tested like never before. STAG: Our Favorite Fantasies Uncensored: the wildest bachelor parties, only on Events IN DEMAND Pay-per-View.
